advisories: 偶尔/轻微的现实暴力
偶尔/轻微的烟酒或毒品使用或相关内容
偶尔/轻微的惊悚或恐怖题材
偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
偶尔/轻微的医药或医疗信息
频繁/强烈的成人或性暗示题材
偶尔/轻微的色情内容或裸露
偶尔/轻微的亵渎或低俗幽默
cn.releaseNotes:
为将您的体验提升到全新水平，我们带来了三项令人惊叹的新功能：
• 升级版 VoiceOver：提供更清晰、详细的描述，让视障用户使用更便捷。
• 智能预测搜索：实时推荐，让您几秒钟内找到所需内容。
• 新增睡眠定时器：可设置视频自动停止播放，适合休息或入睡时使用。
cn.description:
我们的应用实时连接到YouTube，让您播放任何视频，并拥有专为您设计的独家功能！
主要功能亮点：
• 锁屏播放：在后台持续收听您视频的音频。
• 浮动播放（画中画）：在观看视频时使用其他应用。
• 睡眠定时器：设置自动关闭，安心放松。
• 循环模式：无限循环播放您喜欢的视频。
此外还包括：
• 可切换字幕
• 播放速度控制
• 质量选择和全屏模式
• 智能搜索，实时建议（预测搜索）
• 上传日期筛选：按天、周、月或年
FyTube非常适合不想错过任何喜欢主题视频的用户。
尽情探索、播放并享受您喜爱的内容——无干扰！

特别功能
浮动播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他应用时继续观看视频。
只需进入全屏模式，点击画中画按钮——它是播放器顶部的第二个图标。
无论打开哪个应用，您的视频都会浮动在屏幕顶部！

锁屏播放
无中断收听！
即使屏幕关闭，也能继续享受视频音频。非常适合开车或休息时听音乐、播客或喜欢的曲目。
如何激活？
只需锁定设备屏幕，即刻会看到后台播放器。
点击播放——音频将持续不断。

睡眠定时器
安然入睡——应用会自动停止！
启用此功能后，视频将在您设定的时间后自动停止。非常适合睡觉或小憩，无需担心忘记关闭。
如何激活？
点击定时器按钮，选择运行时间，就完成了。
放松，剩下的交给应用！

循环模式
反复播放您喜欢的视频！
启用此功能，视频会自动重复播放任意次数。
怎么知道它是否开启？
激活时图标会变红。
（支持VoiceOver：会提示开启或关闭状态。）
非常适合歌曲、冥想或任何您喜欢反复播放的内容！

需要帮助使用这些功能？访问：fydub.com/fytube

基本功能
• 全屏高清播放
• 简单易用的界面，友好设计
• 随时快进或倒退——不错过精彩部分
• 启用字幕
• 根据喜好调整播放速度
• 更改视频质量
• 智能搜索，实时建议和上传日期筛选：天、周、月、年、全部
• 每个视频包含相关视频区，发现更多有趣内容
• 发现最新视频，保持资讯更新
• 应用直接连接YouTube，让您找到任何视频
• 支持任何兼容AirPlay的设备播放
• 支持VoiceOver（增强描述）
• 无需账户
• 未经您允许，不存储缓存、Cookie或个人数据——安全观看
• 界面支持29种语言
• 无广告，无订阅
购买FyTube一次付费，开启无广告无订阅的新流媒体体验。

最低要求：
• iOS 13或更高版本
• 3G及以上网络连接

隐私政策：
https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube
服务条款：
https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube

与我们应用相关的关键词：
youtube，youtube音乐，youtube vanced，YouTube广告拦截器，无订阅，跳过YouTube广告，无广告音乐，无广告，YouTube应用，YouTube广告屏蔽，拦截弹窗，移除广告，屏蔽广告，广告拦截，内容屏蔽，无广告，无广告浏览器，拦截广告，跳过广告，无广告音乐，无广告YouTube，无广告视频等。

有关于如何使用FyTube的问题？
访问fydub.com/fytube或联系我们——我们乐意为您服务。所有邮件均有回复：fytube@fydub.com

FyTube与YouTube合作。
YouTube名称和标志为Google公司注册商标。版权所有。
© FyTube®

advisories: 偶爾/輕度使用或提及酒精、煙草或藥物
hk.releaseNotes: Fix for startup crash when Speak Screen accessibility option is enabled
hk.description:
你獨自一人在一座陌生的島嶼醒來，島上充滿各種令人意想不到的謎題，等你來挑戰。

你不記得自己是誰，也不記得是如何來到這裡，你唯一能做的就是探索這座島嶼，希望挖掘線索找回自己的記憶，想辦法找到回家的路。

The Witness 是一個單人遊戲，玩家在一個含有數十個地點的開放世界裡探索並克服 500 道以上的謎題。這個遊戲相當敬重玩家的聰明才智，並珍惜他們寶貴的時間。這裡沒有濫竽充數的謎題，每道謎題都結合新的概念在裡面。所以，這是一個充滿創意的遊戲。

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的現實生活暴力
偶爾/輕度使用或提及酒精、煙草或藥物
偶爾/輕度的恐怖或驚嚇題材
偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
偶爾/輕度的藥物或治療資訊
頻繁/極度的成人或性暗示題材
偶爾/輕度的性愛或裸露內容
偶爾/輕度的粗俗用語或低俗幽默
hk.releaseNotes:
為了將您的體驗提升到全新層次，我們帶來了三項令人驚艷的新功能：
• 強化版 VoiceOver：提供更清晰、詳盡的描述，讓視障使用者操作更方便。
• 智慧預測搜尋：即時建議，幫助您在數秒內找到想要的內容。
• 新增睡眠計時器：可自動停止播放，讓您在休息或入睡時更安心。
hk.description:
我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！
主要功能亮點：
• 鎖屏播放：在後台持續收聽您視頻的音頻。
• 浮動播放（畫中畫）：在觀看視頻時使用其他應用。
• 睡眠定時器：設置自動關閉，安心放鬆。
• 循環模式：無限循環播放您喜歡的視頻。
此外還包括：
• 可切換字幕
• 播放速度控制
• 質量選擇和全屏模式
• 智能搜索，即時建議（預測搜索）
• 上傳日期篩選：按天、週、月或年
FyTube非常適合不想錯過任何喜歡主題視頻的用戶。
盡情探索、播放並享受您喜愛的內容——無干擾！

特別功能
浮動播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他應用時繼續觀看視頻。
只需進入全屏模式，點擊畫中畫按鈕——它是播放器頂部的第二個圖標。
無論打開哪個應用，您的視頻都會浮動在螢幕頂部！

鎖屏播放
無中斷收聽！
即使螢幕關閉，也能繼續享受視頻音頻。非常適合開車或休息時聽音樂、播客或喜歡的曲目。
如何激活？
只需鎖定設備螢幕，即刻會看到後台播放器。
點擊播放——音頻將持續不斷。

睡眠定時器
安然入睡——應用會自動停止！
啟用此功能後，視頻將在您設定的時間後自動停止。非常適合睡覺或小憩，無需擔心忘記關閉。
如何激活？
點擊定時器按鈕，選擇運行時間，就完成了。
放鬆，剩下的交給應用！

循環模式
反覆播放您喜歡的視頻！
啟用此功能，視頻會自動重複播放任意次數。
怎麼知道它是否開啟？
啟動時圖標會變紅。
（支援VoiceOver：會提示開啟或關閉狀態。）
非常適合歌曲、冥想或任何您喜歡反覆播放的內容！

需要幫助使用這些功能？訪問：fydub.com/fytube

基本功能
• 全屏高清播放
• 簡單易用的介面，友好設計
• 隨時快進或倒退——不錯過精彩部分
• 啟用字幕
• 根據喜好調整播放速度
• 更改視頻質量
• 智能搜索，即時建議和上傳日期篩選：天、週、月、年、全部
• 每個視頻包含相關視頻區，發現更多有趣內容
• 發現最新視頻，保持資訊更新
• 應用直接連接YouTube，讓您找到任何視頻
• 支援任何兼容AirPlay的設備播放
• 支援VoiceOver（增強描述）
• 無需帳號
• 未經您允許，不儲存快取、Cookie或個人資料——安全觀看
• 介面支援29種語言
• 無廣告，無訂閱
購買FyTube一次付費，開啟無廣告無訂閱的新串流體驗。

最低要求：
• iOS 13或更高版本
• 3G及以上網路連接

隱私政策：
https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube
服務條款：
https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube

與我們應用相關的關鍵詞：
youtube，youtube音樂，youtube vanced，YouTube廣告攔截器，無訂閱，跳過YouTube廣告，無廣告音樂，無廣告，YouTube應用，YouTube廣告屏蔽，攔截彈窗，移除廣告，屏蔽廣告，廣告攔截，內容屏蔽，無廣告，無廣告瀏覽器，攔截廣告，跳過廣告，無廣告音樂，無廣告YouTube，無廣告視頻等。

有關如何使用FyTube的問題？
訪問fydub.com/fytube或聯繫我們——我們樂意為您服務。所有郵件均有回覆：fytube@fydub.com

FyTube與YouTube合作。
YouTube名稱和標誌為Google公司註冊商標。版權所有。
© FyTube®

• 新增睡眠計時器：可自動停止播放，讓您在休息或入睡時更安心。
tw.description:
我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！
主要功能亮點：
• 鎖屏播放：在後台持續收聽您視頻的音頻。
• 浮動播放（畫中畫）：在觀看視頻時使用其他應用。
• 睡眠定時器：設置自動關閉，安心放鬆。
• 循環模式：無限循環播放您喜歡的視頻。
此外還包括：
• 可切換字幕
• 播放速度控制
• 質量選擇和全屏模式
• 智能搜索，即時建議（預測搜索）
• 上傳日期篩選：按天、週、月或年
FyTube非常適合不想錯過任何喜歡主題視頻的用戶。
盡情探索、播放並享受您喜愛的內容——無干擾！

特別功能
浮動播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他應用時繼續觀看視頻。
只需進入全屏模式，點擊畫中畫按鈕——它是播放器頂部的第二個圖標。
無論打開哪個應用，您的視頻都會浮動在螢幕頂部！

鎖屏播放
無中斷收聽！
即使螢幕關閉，也能繼續享受視頻音頻。非常適合開車或休息時聽音樂、播客或喜歡的曲目。
如何激活？
只需鎖定設備螢幕，即刻會看到後台播放器。
點擊播放——音頻將持續不斷。

睡眠定時器
安然入睡——應用會自動停止！
啟用此功能後，視頻將在您設定的時間後自動停止。非常適合睡覺或小憩，無需擔心忘記關閉。
如何激活？
點擊定時器按鈕，選擇運行時間，就完成了。
放鬆，剩下的交給應用！

循環模式
反覆播放您喜歡的視頻！
啟用此功能，視頻會自動重複播放任意次數。
怎麼知道它是否開啟？
啟動時圖標會變紅。
（支援VoiceOver：會提示開啟或關閉狀態。）
非常適合歌曲、冥想或任何您喜歡反覆播放的內容！

需要幫助使用這些功能？訪問：fydub.com/fytube

基本功能
• 全屏高清播放
• 簡單易用的介面，友好設計
• 隨時快進或倒退——不錯過精彩部分
• 啟用字幕
• 根據喜好調整播放速度
• 更改視頻質量
• 智能搜索，即時建議和上傳日期篩選：天、週、月、年、全部
• 每個視頻包含相關視頻區，發現更多有趣內容
• 發現最新視頻，保持資訊更新
• 應用直接連接YouTube，讓您找到任何視頻
• 支援任何兼容AirPlay的設備播放
• 支援VoiceOver（增強描述）
• 無需帳號
• 未經您允許，不儲存快取、Cookie或個人資料——安全觀看
• 介面支援29種語言
• 無廣告，無訂閱
購買FyTube一次付費，開啟無廣告無訂閱的新串流體驗。

最低要求：
• iOS 13或更高版本
• 3G及以上網路連接

隱私政策：
https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube
服務條款：
https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube

與我們應用相關的關鍵詞：
youtube，youtube音樂，youtube vanced，YouTube廣告攔截器，無訂閱，跳過YouTube廣告，無廣告音樂，無廣告，YouTube應用，YouTube廣告屏蔽，攔截彈窗，移除廣告，屏蔽廣告，廣告攔截，內容屏蔽，無廣告，無廣告瀏覽器，攔截廣告，跳過廣告，無廣告音樂，無廣告YouTube，無廣告視頻等。

有關如何使用FyTube的問題？
訪問fydub.com/fytube或聯繫我們——我們樂意為您服務。所有郵件均有回覆：fytube@fydub.com

FyTube與YouTube合作。
YouTube名稱和標誌為Google公司註冊商標。版權所有。
© FyTube®

us.releaseNotes: Fix for startup crash when Speak Screen accessibility option is enabled
us.description:
You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you.

You don't remember who you are, and you don't remember how you got here, but there's one thing you can do: explore the island in hope of discovering clues, regaining your memory, and somehow finding your way home.

The Witness is a single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious. There's no filler; each of those puzzles brings its own new idea into the mix. So, this is a game full of ideas.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Cartoon or Fantasy Violence
us.releaseNotes:
The game now has a store where new features and archetypes will be added in the future!
The price of the game has been permanently reduced by 90%
Last version Include technical update for good optimization.
us.description:
You are reading this text.
 But why?
 Are you looking for a game,
 or has the game found you?
 Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game.
 It is a simulation of creating a new reality.
 Will you shape faith,
 or will faith shape you?
 Humanity has always sought light in the darkness.
 It has always longed to believe in something greater,
 something that gives meaning to existence.
 That’s how religions were born –
 as beacons in the storms of history,
 as compasses in the ocean of life.
 What if you become the creator of a religion?
 What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality?
You are the Creator.
 You are the source.
 You are the inspiration.
 And if you are reading this text – you’re already in the game!
 All that’s left is to install – and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions!

 Become the source of faith – in the strategy simulator Religion Inc.

 Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness.

 There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity.

Game Features
*A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions!
*Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more!
*Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours!
*Hundreds of real-world religious aspects – and even more to come! Learn more about world religions!
*Unique active abilities for each archetype – perform miracles and change the world!
*Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy!

Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator – Religion Inc.

Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Realistic Violence
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Horror/Fear Themes
Infrequent/Mild Cartoon or Fantasy Violence
Infrequent/Mild Medical/Treatment Information
Frequent/Intense Mature/Suggestive Themes
Infrequent/Mild Sexual Content and Nudity
Infrequent/Mild Profanity or Crude Humor
us.releaseNotes:
To take your experience to the next level, we present three amazing new features:
• Enhanced VoiceOver: clearer and more detailed descriptions to make the app easier to use for our visually impaired users.
• Smart predictive search: find what you’re looking for in seconds thanks to real-time suggestions.
• Added Sleep Timer: you can schedule playback to stop automatically while you rest or sleep.
us.description:
Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and lets you play any video with exclusive features designed just for you!
Highlight Features:
• Locked screen playback: Keep listening to your videos’ audio in the background.
• Floating playback (PIP): Use other apps while watching your videos.
• Sleep timer: Set an automatic shutdown and relax worry-free.
• Loop mode: Play your favorite video on infinite repeat.
It also includes:
• Toggleable subtitles
• Playback speed control
• Quality selection and fullscreen mode
• Smart search with real-time suggestions (predictive search)
• Upload date filters: Day, week, month, or year
FyTube is perfect for those who don’t want to miss a single video about their favorite topics.
Explore, play, and enjoy your favorite content to the fullest — interruption-free!

SPECIAL FEATURES
FLOATING PLAYBACK
Never stop watching! With this feature, you can keep watching your videos while using other apps .
Just enter fullscreen mode and tap the PIP button — it’s the second icon at the top of the player.
Your video will float on top of your screen no matter what app you open!

LOCKED SCREEN PLAYBACK
Listen without interruptions!
Keep enjoying your video’s audio even when your screen is off. Perfect for listening to music, podcasts, or your favorite tunes while driving or relaxing.
How to activate it?
Just lock your device screen. You’ll instantly see the background player.
Tap Play — and that’s it! The audio will keep going without pauses.

SLEEP TIMER
Fall asleep peacefully — your app will stop by itself!
Enable this feature to automatically stop your videos after the time you choose. Perfect for sleeping or napping without worrying about stopping anything.
How to activate it?
Tap the timer button, choose how long you want it to run, and that’s it.
Relax and let the app handle the rest!

LOOP MODE
Play your favorite video over and over again!
Enable this feature to make the video repeat automatically as many times as you want.
How to know if it’s on?
The icon will turn red when active.
(VoiceOver compatible: it will indicate whether it’s on or off.)
Perfect for songs, meditations, or any content you love to repeat!

Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube

BASIC FEATURES
• Fullscreen high-quality video playback
• Easy-to-use interface, friendly design
• Skip forward or rewind anytime — never miss the best parts
• Subtitle activation
• Adjust playback speed to your preference
• Change video quality
• Smart search with real-time suggestions and upload date filters: day, week, month, year, all
• Each video includes a related videos section to discover more interesting content
• Discover the latest videos and stay up to date with the news
• Our app connects directly to YouTube, letting you find any video
• Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device
• VoiceOver compatible (enhanced descriptions)
• No account required
• We don’t store cache, cookies, or personal data without your permission — watch safely
• Interface available in 29 languages
• NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS
Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new streaming experience — ad-free and subscription-free.

Minimum Requirements:
• iOS 13 or later
• 3G connection or higher

Privacy Policy:
https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube
Terms of Service:
https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube

Keywords related to our app:
youtube, youtube music, youtube vanced, ad blocker for YouTube, no subscription, skip ads on YouTube, music without ads, ad-free, YouTube app, adblocker for YouTube, block pop-ups, remove ads, block ads, adblock, content blocker, no ads, ad-free browser, block advertising, skip ads, ad-free music, YouTube without ads, videos without ads, etc.

Have questions about how to use FyTube?
Visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us — we’ll be happy to help. We reply to all emails: fytube@fydub.com

FyTube works with YouTube.
The YouTube name and logo are trademarks of Google, Inc. All rights reserved.
© FyTube®

tr.description:
Do you want to remove unwanted items from your photos? Then this app is for you.
With Image Eraser, you can remove undesirable objects from your images, such as power lines, people, logos, watermarks, text or any other undesired artifacts as easy as taking a shot itself.

Image Eraser uses advanced algorithms to actually fill in the background with appropriate textures for that
area. It has brought the magic of intelligent fill to the iPhone!

Features:
- Delete unwanted people from photo
- Erasing wires and power lines
- Erase wrinkles and skin blemishes
- Repair old photos
- Remove moving objects from photo
- Remove watermarks, data stamps and much more unwanted objects
- Easy to get use & started

Also take a look at these other free apps in the App Store:

• Photo Cut Out Editor - The easiest way to cut out and composite photos.
• Color Recolor Effects - Change color of everything.
• Photo Focus Effects -  Get you highlighted and dramatical by simply selecting focus area.
• Face Story - Morph face and make movie.

Give us a review is appreciated.  This will help and encourage us to make the app better.

Subscription:
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable
- Privacy Policy: http://ptuwang.com/conf/privacy_notice_cutout.pdf
- Terms of Use: http://ptuwang.com/conf/term_gen.pdf
